name: AMERICAN ASSOCIATION OF CROP INSURERS (AACI)
description: Provide Federal government representation for the full spectrum of crop insurance industry
sampleDescriptions: USDA's Risk Management Agency (RMA) - Federal Crop Insurance Corp. (FCIC) regarding its general administration of the Federal crop insurance program; negotiation with RMA on the Standard Reinsurance agreement; 2014 Farm Bill provisions regarding the crop insurance program (PL 113-79); reauthorization of 2014 Farm Bill regarding the crop insurance program.

USDA's Risk Management Agency (RMA) - Federal Crop Insurance Corp. (FCIC) regarding its general administration of the federal crop insurance program; negotiation with RMA on the Standard Reinsurance agreement; Implementation of the 2018 Farm Bill provisions regarding the crop insurance program (PL 113-79); Implementation of the 2018 Farm Bill regarding the crop insurance program.
